traits.Blood Frenzy: The harpy has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.
traits.Dark Devotion: The harpy has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.Multiattack: The harpy makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.
